overview: Darren Wiebe has 20 years of experience in the technology services industry as a consultant, executive, and entrepreneur. As CTO of Vantage Media, Darren currently leads a number of critical teams including Strategy Incubation, Business Intelligence, Network Operations, and Implementation â€“ as well as overseeing several emerging business channels. With an extensive background in both technology and business integration, Darren provides a unique ability to bridge the two worlds. Prior to Vantage, he led a technical operations center for Microsoft/FrontBridge which he grew from concept to 50 employees in 18 months. This group was instrumental in facilitating growth by scaling email spam analysis, expanding network operations, and enhancing technical support capacity. Prior to Microsoft, Darren was CTO of a national Managed Services provider in Canada and was previously President of a leading technology integration and consulting firm.
